mapper.select: SELECT M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, TO_CHAR(M_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS M_BIRTH, M_EMAIL, M_PHONE, M_TERMS, M_CLASS, M_LASTLOGIN, DELETE_CON, DELETE_TIME FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{M_ID}
SELECT M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, TO_CHAR(M_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS M_BIRTH, M_EMAIL, M_PHONE, M_TERMS, M_CLASS, M_LASTLOGIN, DELETE_CON, DELETE_TIME FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{M_ID} AND M_PW = #{M_PW}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(M_ID, M_PW, M_EMAIL, M_NAME, M_BIRTH, M_PHONE, M_TERMS, M_CLASS) values(#{M_ID},#{M_PW},#{M_EMAIL},#{M_NAME},#{M_BIRTH},#{M_PHONE},#{M_TERMS},#{M_CLASS})
mapper.select: select M_ID from member where M_ID= #{M_ID}
select M_ID from member where M_NAME= #{M_NAME} AND M_EMAIL = #{M_EMAIL}
select * from member where M_ID= #{M_ID} AND M_EMAIL =#{M_EMAIL} AND M_NAME = #{M_NAME}
mapper.update: update member set M_PW=#{M_PW} where M_ID=#{M_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into PLANNER(PLAN_NUM, PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_DATE, PLAN_DAYS, M_ID, TL_NUM) values(PLAN_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{PLAN_TITLE},#{PLAN_DATE},#{PLAN_DAYS},#{M_ID},#{TL_NUM})
mapper.select: SELECT p.PLAN_NUM, p.PLAN_TITLE, TO_CHAR(p.PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_DATE, p.PLAN_DAYS, p.M_ID, p.TL_NUM, TO_CHAR(p.PLAN_DATE + p.PLAN_DAYS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_LASTDATE FROM PLANNER p JOIN MEMBER m ON p.M_ID = m.M_ID WHERE m.M_ID = #{M_ID}
